mapper.insert: INSERT INTO battle_sessions (user_id, battle_id, dungeon_id, status, current_turn, context_json, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{battleId}, #{dungeonId}, #{status}, #{currentTurn}, #{contextJson}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE battle_sessions SET status = #{status}, current_turn = #{currentTurn}, context_json = #{contextJson}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM battle_sessions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 0
